item.title: Former Michigan wrestler urges more victims to â€˜speak up'
item.description: SOUTHFIELD, Mich. (AP) — A College of Michigan wrestler from the 1970s mentioned Thursday that he used to be kicked off the team and lost his monetary support after complaining he had been physically abused by a sports actions doctor.
